GapFillDragDrop.Title: The verb to be
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on the correct word and drag it to the correct gap.
GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop:
1. Iam a student.
2. We arefrom Russia.
3. This is Isabel. Sheis Portuguese.
4. Itis a Nokia phone.
5. Jennifer Lopez isAmerican.
6. I'mfrom Poland.
7. Theyare students.
8. This is Antonio Banderas. Heis Spanish.
